SELECT a.id, a.is_read, a.msg_id, a.user_id, a.is_close, a.dept_id, a.create_time, b.title, b.type, b.`code`, b.`level`, b.content, c.username FROM sys_msg_user AS a LEFT JOIN sys_msg AS b ON a.msg_id = b.id LEFT JOIN sys_user AS c ON a.user_id= c.id
b.is_delete = 0 AND c.is_delete = 0
AND b.title LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{userMsgQuery.title}, '%')
AND b.`code` LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{userMsgQuery.code}, '%')
AND c.username LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{userMsgQuery.username}, '%')
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC

SELECT a.id, a.title, a.`code`, a.type, a.`level`, a.content, b.id as msg_id, b.is_close, b.is_read, b.dept_id, b.user_id, b.create_time, c.username FROM sys_msg AS a LEFT JOIN sys_msg_user AS b ON a.id = b.msg_id LEFT JOIN sys_user AS c ON b.user_id = c.id WHERE a.is_delete = 0 AND c.is_delete = 0 AND b.is_close = 0 AND c.username = #{username} ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
